Responsive

CSS/SCSSTailwind Class
@media (min-width: 640px)sm:[class]
@media (min-width: 768px)md:[class]
@media (min-width: 1024px)lg:[class]
@media (max-width: 768px)max-md:[class]
display: nonehidden
display: block (on mobile)block sm:hidden

Pseudo-classes

CSS/SCSSTailwind Class
&:hoverhover:[class]
&:focusfocus:[class]
&:activeactive:[class]
&:first-childfirst:[class]
&:last-childlast:[class]
&:odd-childodd:[class]
